sentences.en: By Sekolah's grace, the priestess had recognized Shemsen for what he was.
sentences.cn: 依靠瑟寇拉的恩惠, 那个祭司认出了舍姆森是什么.

sentences.en: Furbolg Shaman: Thank you, Priestess. We will reward you when you return.
sentences.cn: 熊怪萨满: 太感动了, 祭司. 当完后我们一定会报答的.

sentences.en: If Apollo was a musician, then his priestess, the Pythia, was his instrument.
sentences.cn: 如果阿波罗是音乐家, 那么他的女祭司皮提亚就是他的乐器.

sentences.en: Janis Joplin was known as the High Priestess of Rock.
sentences.cn: 贾尼斯∙乔普林就是众所周知的摇滚乐大师。

sentences.en: Jarlaxle remarked to Dinin, taking no heed of the priestess.
sentences.cn: 贾拉索反问狄宁, 并不理会女祭司.

sentences.en: My blow, it has avenged Thee - Thy Priestess now is free!
sentences.cn: 我为你打出这复仇的一击 —— 你的女祭司已是自由之身!

sentences.en: Nevertheless, Maiev grudgingly acknowledged the new high priestess and followed her orders.
sentences.cn: 不过, 玛维还是勉强地认可了这位新的高阶女祭师,听从她的号令.

sentences.en: Resurrect: A Priestess can resurrect friendly characters, bringing them back from the dead to fight anew.
sentences.cn: 复活: 女祭司可以复活己方同伴, 让他们重新投入战斗.

sentences.en: Shandris Feathermoon: Pardon, Priestess, but you've been staring out across Ashenvale for hours.
sentences.cn: 珊蒂斯?羽月: 请原谅, 女祭司大人, 可您已经盯着艾辛瓦尔的那一边看了好几小时了.

sentences.en: THE ANCIENT EGYPTIAN HIGH - PRIESTESS ANEH - TET AWAKENS FROM HER 4000 YEAR SLEEP TO RULE THE WORLD.
sentences.cn: 古埃及大女祭祀ANEH-TET从她的4000年的睡眠里醒过来,她要重回人间统治世界.

sentences.en: The Inverted High Priestess is active in events where she should be more passive.
sentences.cn: 反置的高尚女教士在需要被动的时候反而过于积极.

sentences.en: The priestess - she gave her name as Quaanteel - offered Shemsen meat.
sentences.cn: 那个自称夸安提尔的女祭司给舍姆森肉吃.

sentences.en: The Prophet: Peace, Priestess. They've come to aid you against Legion.
sentences.cn: 先知: 息怒, 女祭司. 他们来此是为了帮助你们对抗燃烧军团的.

sentences.en: There was , he said, in days of yore , an illustrious priestess of St. Ewold.
sentences.cn: 他说, 从前, 圣埃沃尔德有一位著明的女祭司.

sentences.en: With the priestess's dire threats swirling in his memory, Shemsen had come here, to Umberlee.
sentences.cn: 女祭司残暴的威胁仍在他脑海中盘旋, 所以他来到了这里, 来找乌姆贝尔蕾.

words.tran_cn: 僧侣的；似教士的；祭司的
祭司的；僧侣的；似教士的
神职者的谋略；祭司的本领
使成为神职人员；任命…为祭司

trans.tran_en: a woman with religious duties and responsibilities in some non-Christian religions
